actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 and the Department of Transportation Act to extend for 1 year the period during which the Federal Government pays 100 percent of the cost of rail service assistance programs involving rehabilitation, maintenance, and improvement of rail properties.

summary.text: Amends the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 and the Department of Transportation Act to extend for one year the period during which the Federal Government pays 100 percent of the cost of local rail service assistance programs involving rehabilitation and maintenance of rail properties.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 and the Department of Transportation Act to extend for 1 year the period during which the Federal Government pays 100 percent of the cost of rail service assistance programs involving rehabilitation, maintenance, and improvement of rail properties.
